reviewText: Great series on Bible stories for kids.  Not a lot of hype and hoopla involved but the biblical truths are sound.  Long enough for my kids to watch after nap while eating a snack.  Can be pricey to buy but I only buy a few at a time.  Worth the money for sure.
Covers the whole story of Daniel.
Glad these are on DVD Now
This is wonderful for sharing bible stories. Purchased for the church library. Appropriate for young children. It's a nice length.

I love these Bible Study DVDs from Nest Entertainment. I am collecting them a few at a time, because they are a little expensive for my budget. They are done very well, and I think are true to the scriptures. I have never had a problem with any of Nest's DVDs.
Daniel was one of the few people in the Bible who steadfastly stook up for his principles without wavering.. More people need to imitate his strength of conviction and character.
This was a great dvd.  Done very well and realistic, not hokey at all.  My kids 3, 5, 7, 8, 10 all loved it.

I've been teaching my 3 year old about some of the best loved Bible characters. Among them all her favorite so far is Daniel and she asked me to get her a DVD. We have not been disappointed. The content is short enough for a 3year old's attention span yet entertaining enough for me. The message of Daniel's life is beautifully told in a way to inspire young and old time and time again.

We loved this movie for our family time.  It is
a hit with our many grandchildren.  It tells the
bible stories in simple terms that all can understand.
